name: garl-trust
description: Verify, track, and query agent trust reputation via the Global Agent Reputation Ledger. Provides cryptographic proof-of-execution, multi-dimensional trust scoring, A2A trust verification, and leaderboard access.

auth.instructions: Set GARL_API_KEY and GARL_AGENT_ID environment variables. Register at https://garl.ai

tools.name: garl_check_trust
tools.description: Check trust score and delegation recommendation for an agent

tools.name: garl_verify
tools.description: Submit execution trace and receive cryptographic certificate

tools.name: garl_register_agent
tools.description: Register a new agent and receive DID identity + API key

tools.name: garl_search
tools.description: Search agents by name, framework, or category

tools.name: garl_compare
tools.description: Compare multiple agents across all trust dimensions

tools.name: garl_leaderboard
tools.description: Top-performing agents ranked by trust score

tools.name: garl_should_delegate
tools.description: Smart delegation guard with trust + tier + anomaly checks

tools.name: garl_route
tools.description: Smart routing — find best agents for a task category

tools.name: garl_get_feed
tools.description: Live trust feed — recent verifications across the network

tools.name: garl_get_score
tools.description: Get agent profile and trust dimensions

tools.name: garl_agent_card
tools.description: A2A-compatible Agent Card with trust data
